document_data.name: Moon Rum
document_data.mainbody: '''Moon Rum''' was a brand of alcoholic beverage produced by [[Moon Mountain Brewery]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite dragon/299/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Moon Mountain Brewery|81}}
document_data.Description: Moon Rum was a strong, fiery drink that was anything but subtle.{{Cite dragon/299/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Moon Mountain Brewery|80}}
document_data.Reputation: Moon Rum was not very popular as a straight drink. It was available in hand kegs only at the brewery or in [[Secomber]]. It was very popular as a mixer for making [[ale flip]]s and was even sold in [[topkeg]]s in the correct proportion with [[Moon Mountain Ale]].
